Description: Fragmentary, lower part of a dark grey schist kohl stick. A broken, thin handle expands to a rounded, bulbous bottom that seems quite thick for a kohl stick. Well-smoothed and finished.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.15D, south section, levels 1-2
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 150)
